charges.charge_description: 18 U.S.C. CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD THE GOVERNMENT WITH RESPECT TO CLAIMS(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment for a term of 15 months. This term shall run consecutive to the federal sentence imposed by the Southern District of Maryland at Docket No. 06-00260. Supervised release for a term of 3 years. This term shall run concurrently to the federal sentence imposed by the Southern District of Maryland at Docket No. 06-00260. Special assessment of $100. Restitution in the amount of $7,683.14. Fine and interest waived.

charges.charge_description: 18 U.S.C. CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD THE GOVERNMENT WITH RESPECT TO CLAIMS(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment for a term of 3 months to be served concurrently to the State sentence imposed by Allegheny County Court of Common Pleas at Criminal No. 197508889. No supervised release ordered. Special assessment of $100. Restitution in the amount of $300. Fime and interest waived.
